title: White fluff on my pothos???
description: Does anyone know what this white fluff is all over my pothos plant? I thought it was just dust but it's definitely not.

title: Dying edges on fiddle leaf fig leaves.
description: I can't figure out what's killing my fiddle leaf fig. I water it all the time, it has enough humidity, and I play music to it, but it seems so unhappy.

title: Pale leaves
description: What am I doing wrong? My caladium is supposed to be vibrant green and white. In reality, it's pale green (almost yellow), and offwhite.

title: Mold?
description: There is literally yellow mold growing on top of the soil of my Dracaena. What would cause this? Does yellow mean something specific? Help. :(

title: My peace lily look so sad!
description: My peace lily's leaves are sooo droopy. Why is she wilting? Is she depressed?
